desc: Just step on and ride. The powerful 250 Watt motor instantly powers on and starts accelerating you forward. No need to push. No need to sweat. Arrive to class in style. Ride electric. Ride free.

layout.text:
We build electric skateboards, 
that won't break your bank.

Take a ride on our affordable
single motor electric skateboard,
or our powerful dual motor
electric skateboard.
Select below.👇
